item.description:
If anyone has time to go on Friday night, it is a sponsored by Target.

$1 Friday Nights Sponsored by are offered every Friday from 5–9pm. This time does not really work for my tot but you guys feel free to organize :) 

On June 23rd Admission


Adults: $12.00
Seniors(65+): $12.00
Children (1-15): $12.00
(0-12 Months): Free!
Members: Free!
Also ask your local library if they have passes to Boston Children;s Museum. It is a reduced fare if you get lucky and reserve a pass. If you do reserve one, take someone from this group with you :)


Boston Children's Museum admission is only $6 per person from 4-5pm Saturday – Thursday. If you guys think that this time is better for you, I will change the time for this meetup, just let me know.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Children's Museum Boston
